item.title: Nginx as a Reverse Proxy to Forward Sub-Domains
item.description: Last month, Rebecca and I moved to Durham, North Carolina. As a result, I’ve had to re-setup our home network. In years past, I setup a virtual machine running Nginx as a reverse-proxy (Tangela), and I decided to do that again on the new network. While it is a simple process, it is one that other people often ask me about. So, this time… I’m taking notes!
